trends: There has been one other sighting in Newville
There were no other sightings in Newville on or around September 30th 1974
divs: sighting details somewhat distraught over a relationship breakup, i decided to take a late night walk to try to clear my thoughts. i found myself walking just outside newville (half a mile?) when i glanced up to see a yellow light moving across the sky somewhat above the mountain. my first thought was that it was a satellite or plane\jet with the sun still reflecting off of it. watching it, i further thought, "wait a minute...it's almost 2 am...the sun wouldn't still be refecting at this time." also noting that it was moving a little faster than normal nighttime objects, i stopped walking to watch it. as soon as i stopped walking, the object slowed down, dropped lower and shot my direction so fast that i ducked down behind the embankment beside the road. it was at this time that i noticed the crickets were all chirping very loudly. after a few seconds, i got the courage to slowly stand back upright and look. at this point, i saw a disc with a small dome on top hovering above the trees possibly near the conodoguinet creek some distance away. at this point, the disc appeared to land in a group of trees. i did not stick around to see any more, running as fast as i could towards newville. near the elementary school, a car stopped and asked if i needed a ride. i took the ride into the center of town. on the short ride, the driver, apparently seeing my fear, asked if i was ok. i thought for a second to ask if he saw it too, but decided he would think i'm nuts, so i just said yeah, i was ok. dropped off at my car just outside a friends house, i knocked on their door, but his dad came to the door and told me to go after i said what i had seen. he thought i was on drugs (i wasn't, nor had i been drinking). later his dad said i was "white as a sheet." the object itself was similar to the one at the top of this webpage, but with a smaller dome and the top part coming down lower, making the bottom almost flat. the entire object was glowing a dull yellow, but with at least four lights on the bottom glowing brighter and lighting further, sequentially (rapidly)in a clockwise rotation. the dome was also glowing quite a bit brighter than the body, with the exception of a darker spot on the dome, that made me think it was something in the dome watching outside, causing me great fear. i can easily draw a picture of it still 37 years later.
